original_text: Surely at the commandment of the Lord came this upon Judah, to remove them out of his sight, for the sins of Manasseh, according to all that he did;
korean_text: 이 일이 유다에 임함은 곧 여호와의 말씀대로 그들을 자기 앞에서 물리치고자 하심이니 이는 므낫세의 지은 모든 죄 때문이며

sentences.original_text: Surely at the commandment of the Lord
to remove them out of his sight
according to all that he did
